references.name: Robert Gunn FRSA P.Eng
references.reference:
John was an engineer working within the Field Services Department of Atomic Energy of Canada ltd. John was responsible for supporting and executing a variety of engineering field services. 

John was very quick to understand and analyze technical problems.  He communicated clearly to both subordinates and supervisors. He demonstrated clear leadership skills coupled with an enthusiasm to accept assignments of increasing responsibility.  The quality of his work was excellent and his productivity frequently exceeded expectations.

references.name: Ralph Merry
references.reference:
John was the salesman/advocate/representative for BR while he worked at Schlumberger.  He was the by far the best person in this role as I have ever encountered. He has focused on project definition, management, and completion in a very professional and orchestrated manner. I wish we had more people with such talent working in that function.

I thought so much of the man, I later hired him at COP where he did adapted quickly and did an excellent job in a technical leadership role.
